76  def run(self, request, courseid):
77 
78  user = request.session['user']
79 
80  if request.method == "GET":
81  if courseid in user['courses']:
82  course = self.bus.getCourse(user, courseid)
83  return render(request, "Course/frame.html", {'course':course})
84  else:
85  raise PermissionDenied(lang.DICT["EXCEPTION_403_STD"])
